doc.title: Gardens of Alcatraz
doc.plot: The worst of the worst, the toughest of the tough were sent to Alcatraz. It was home for criminals like Al "Scarface" Capone, George "Machine Gun" Kelly, and "The Birdman" Robert Stroud. But Alcatraz was also home to 140 years of extraordinary gardens, designed, tended, and cared for by soldiers, families, children, guards, and inmates. This is the story of their Gardens on the Rock.
